name: Finset.Icc_add_Icc_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : Add α
inst✝⁴ : Preorder α
inst✝³ : DecidableEq α
inst✝² : AddLeftMono α
inst✝¹ : AddRightMono α
inst✝ : LocallyFiniteOrder α
a b c d : α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HAdd.hAdd (Finset.Icc a b) (Finset.Icc c d)) (Finset.Icc (HAdd.hAdd a c) (HAdd.hAdd b d))
decl:
@[to_additive Icc_add_Icc_subset]
theorem Icc_mul_Icc_subset' [LocallyFiniteOrder α] (a b c d : α) :
    Icc a b * Icc c d ⊆ Icc (a * c) (b * d) :=
  Finset.coe_subset.mp <| by simpa using Set.Icc_mul_Icc_subset' _ _ _ _
